name: SpaceTrader
description:
- MADE SPECIFICALLY FOR THE GAMESHELL CONSOLE -

The premise of the game is that the player is a space trader based in the spaceport of Earth. Buy and sell goods across the solar system. Prices fluctuate with the market and events have a direct effect on the value of goods. Pirates lurk around the system and may pull you out of jump travel at any time. Do you fight or run!?

Written for the GameShell as an entry to their first ever GameJam. Please note you will need an ARM compatible device, such as a GameShell or Raspberry Pi.

Tools used: Rust / SDL2 / VIM

You can support my projects at https://patreon.com/destroyallpixels
